Bought 4 of these retro bowling style shirts for a cruise I recently took. Wanted something that screamed “vacation” just short of a Hawaii shirt and these did the job. 评论概述: Feels like plastic sheeting, not fabric

So its not a retro fabric--design yes--but its double knit. So its a little sticky to wear here in the summer. But its a very fun design and not expensive.

I really enjoyed wearing this shirt for the occasion I intended, but had to steam the heck out of it to remove the wrinkles. I will be surprised if it holds up long, as the material does not appear to be a great quality. I hope I'm wrong, and if I am, I'll buy more of them from this company.
